underlying_goal: Add a new discussion slide about evaluation metrics to a research presentation, framing it as a decision point for a meeting.
primary_success: Created a well-structured slide with a pros/cons layout that clearly framed the tradeoff between two evaluation metrics, turning it into an effective discussion point.
brief_summary: The user requested a new slide to discuss evaluation metrics (AUROC vs pAUROC). The agent added a new slide presenting the options with pros and cons, updated the meeting agenda, and provided a useful insight on the topic.
